item.title: A letter to the lonely developer
item.description: Me against a bug, reminding myself how to solve any defect Link to heading Dear developer, Donâ€™t give up, keep up with your efforts to find other ways to understand the bugâ€™s root cause. I know it can be frustrating. The agonies with the process can be ruff. But, youâ€™ve got it, you solved many in the past, and you will solve this one too. It is part of your job.
